flawed_nl_solution:
Last year's winner walked 11 miles because 44 / 4 = <<44/4=11>>11
Elroy has to walk 16 miles to collect $44 because 44 / 2.75 = <<44/2.75=16>>16
Elroy will walk 7 more miles because 16 - 11 = <<16-11=7>>7
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
